original_text: But God was very kind to me. He helped me to become a different person. And because God has been so kind to me, the result has been great. I have worked more than all the other apostles. But it was not really I myself who could do that work. No, I could do it because God was so kind to me.
korean_text: 그러나 내가 나 된 것은 하나님의 은혜로 된 것이니 내게 주신 그의 은혜가 헛되지 아니하여 내가 모든 사도보다 더 많이 수고하였으나 내가 한 것이 아니요 오직 나와 함께 하신 하나님의 은혜로라

sentences.original_text: But God was very kind to me.
He helped me to become a different person.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 내가 다른 사람이 되도록 도우셨다.

sentences.original_text: And because God has been so kind to me,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님께서 내게 이렇게 친절하셨기 때문에,

sentences.original_text: I have worked more than all the other apostles.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 다른 모든 사도들보다 더 일했다.

sentences.original_text: But it was not really I myself who could do that work.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 일을 할 수 있었던 것은 정말 내 자신이 아니었다.

sentences.original_text: No, I could do it because God was so kind to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 아니, 내가 그것을 할 수 있었던 것은 하나님이 내게 그렇게 친절하셨기 때문이다.
